Patients SS bone marrow involvement also eligible . 4 . Patients must receive least two prior treatment regimen least one systemic therapy regimen . Systemic regimen include oral bexarotene , PUVA , photophoresis , chemotherapy methotrexate , interferon . Topical steroid alone consider treatment regimen . 5 . Patients must disease progression follow recent treatment regimen inadequate response recent treatment regimen . 6 . Patients accrue one two group : Patients previously treat oral bexarotene patient prior oral bexarotene treatment . Exclusion criterion : 1 . Prior treatment HDAC inhibitor . 2 . Patients visceral disease include CNS involvement ( i.e . stage IVB CTCL ) . Note ; Patients SS bone marrow involvement eligible . 3 . Impaired cardiac function 4 . Concomitant use drug risk cause torsades de pointes 5 . Patients receive chemotherapy investigational drug undergone major surgery < 4 week prior start study drug recover side effect therapy 6 .
